item.description:
The Agenda so far
Speaker TBD
Analytics + A/B testing
- measuring just enough, not too much,
- developing a plan for what % time spent optimizing
- optimization around the sales process

John Prendergast
Discarding Ideas as the essence of Lean Startups - From crowdsourced equity research platform to blogging to a collaborative investment platform and how our business got here
If people are interested, I'm planning to preview a new product we're building called Blueleaf.com as a case study in customer development leading to a pivot and the re-framing/discarding of original ideas

Customer Development 101
- For those who are interested we can talk about the basics of customer development and lean startups
item.how_to_find_us: Check in at the front desk and come up to the 5th Floor
item.name: Lean Startup Circle Boston January Meetup
